citations.narrative:
On Sunday, November 2, an Aplomado falcon escaped. While attempting to transfer the animal from a glove to a creance
line, an employee did not effectively secure the bird. The bird flew into a nearby tree and subsequently flew out of sight.
The facility was able to recover the falcon three days later on Wednesday, November 5th. After a veterinary examination,
the bird was found to be in good health and appeared to have eaten in the days preceding.
Utilizing adequately trained employees is important in preventing animal escapes. Animal escapes can affect the health
and well-being of the animal.
Employees have since undergone re-training and policy changes have been implemented to prevent future errors that can
lead to escape. From this day forward, December 9, 2025, adequately trained employees must be utilized to maintain the
professionally acceptable level of handling practices set forth in this subpart.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.159 
   
Employees 
On Sunday, November 2, an Aplomado falcon escaped. While attempting to transfer the animal from a glove to a creance 
line, an employee did not effectively secure the bird. The bird flew into a nearby tree and subsequently flew out of sight. 
The facility was able to recover the falcon three days later on Wednesday, November 5th. After a veterinary examination, 
the bird was found to be in good health and appeared to have eaten in the days preceding.  
 
Utilizing adequately trained employees is important in preventing animal escapes. Animal escapes can affect the health 
and well-being of the animal. 
 
Employees have since undergone re-training and policy changes have been implemented to prevent future errors that can 
lead to escape. From this day forward, December 9, 2025, adequately trained employees must be utilized to maintain the 
professionally acceptable level of handling practices set forth in this subpart. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
